SELECT items_comments.comment_level as commentLevel, items_comments.content as content, items_comments.sepc_name as sepcName, items_comments.created_time as createdTime, users.face as face, users.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments LEFT JOIN users ON items_comments.user_id = users.id WHERE items_comments.item_id = #{pramsMap.itemId}
AND items_comments.comment_level = #{pramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id )tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pramsMap.keyword},'%')
order by
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount DESC
i.item_name asc
